mapper.select: SELECT /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.selectSysAdminSmsSndTgt Generator(Generator) 2018-05-23 */ ADMIN_ID , SMS_SND_TGT_CD , REGTR_ID , REG_DT , UDTER_ID , UDT_DT FROM SYS_ADMIN_SMS_SND_TGT WHERE 1 = 1 AND ADMIN_ID = #{adminId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND SMS_SND_TGT_CD = #{smsSndTgtCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
